channel.title: [317] client error when i run and try to log in
channel.description:
ok i got a bluurr client and went into the GUI file and changed the ip to mine then i compiled and ran it. then i logged in to a black screen and it instantly logged me out then i get this error on client run. :
Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection
any ideas of whats wrong?

item.title: [317] client error when i run and try to log in
item.dc:creator: @D_T_55 D T 55
item.description:
@D_T_55 wrote:

thats what happend to me and i have no clue what to do.

Read full topic
